metadata.title: Trudeau 7.5" Battery Operated Gravity Pepper Mill, Black
features: 7.5 inch tall pepper mill can be used one handed, making it ideal for food prep in the kitchen
Stylish design makes it equally elegant for the table or kitchen
description: With the Gravity Pepper Mill you'll be able to have fresh ground pepper when and where you need it. The mills stand 7.5 inches tall and has a contemporary, stylish look and feel. The pepper mill has a high quality ceramic grinder that will never rust. Uses four AAA batteries not included. By Trudeau a company that develops visionary products. Add an exciting flavor to your day, with Trudeau. Style eloquence, innovation Trudeau letting you savor life's little moments.
